title: Identify the Oxidation and Reduction
text: Which electrode is losing mass and which is gaining? This will help identify the oxidation and reduction reactions.

title: Oxidation Reaction
text: The electrode that loses mass is undergoing oxidation. Write the oxidation half-reaction for this electrode.

title: Reduction Reaction
text: The electrode that gains mass is undergoing reduction. Write the reduction half-reaction for this electrode.

title: Combine the Half-Reactions
text: Combine the oxidation and reduction half-reactions to write the overall cell reaction.
